divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside smoking a cigarette and looking at the stars and clouds when I saw a bright light that I thought was the north star at first but then it was moving. It was moving pretty quickly from west to east, thought it was an airplane at first but then I did see an airplane and realized it did not look the same. It had no flashing lights, just one solid bright white light. It moved faster than a plane at that height and made no sound. It moved from west to east then suddenly turned south and then turned again and dissappeared out of sight, not behind a cloud or anything, just slowly faded. I just don't think it was an airplane because there were no flashing lights and it turned way too sharply too fast, like a 90degree turn very quickly for that altitude. Wondering if anyone else saw this?
trends: There have been 126 other sightings in Indianapolis
There was one other sighting in Indianapolis on or around September 13th 2010
Summary: Airplane like but not an airplane.
